original_solution_mapping.L1: 5 hours in the studio is the same as 5 * 60 = <<5*60=300>>300 minutes.
original_solution_mapping.L2: To record all of his songs, Elvis takes 12 * 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 minutes.
original_solution_mapping.L3: After editing and recording 300 - 120 - 30 = <<300-120-30=150>>150 minutes are left to write all of his songs.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Songwriting therefore took 150 / 10 = <<150/10=15>>15 minutes per song.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2817.
    Returns: the number of minutes it took Elvis to write each song.
    """
    # L1
    studio_hours = 5 # He spends 5 hours in the studio
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    total_studio_minutes = studio_hours * minutes_per_hour

    # L2
    minutes_per_song_record = 12 # Each song takes 12 minutes to record
    num_songs = 10 # 10 songs
    total_recording_minutes = minutes_per_song_record * num_songs

    # L3
    total_editing_minutes = 30 # it takes 30 minutes to edit all of his songs
    remaining_writing_minutes = total_studio_minutes - total_recording_minutes - total_editing_minutes

    # L4
    minutes_per_song_write = remaining_writing_minutes / num_songs

    # FA
    answer = minutes_per_song_write
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: 5 hours in the studio is the same as {studio_hours} * {minutes_per_hour} = <<{studio_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_studio_minutes}>>{total_studio_minutes} minutes.
To record all of his songs, Elvis takes {minutes_per_song_record} * {num_songs} = <<{minutes_per_song_record}*{num_songs}={total_recording_minutes}>>{total_recording_minutes} minutes.

After editing and recording {total_studio_minutes} - {total_recording_minutes} - {total_editing_minutes} = <<{total_studio_minutes}-{total_recording_minutes}-{total_editing_minutes}={remaining_writing_minutes}>>{remaining_writing_minutes} minutes are left to write all of his songs.
Songwriting therefore took {remaining_writing_minutes} / {num_songs} = <<{remaining_writing_minutes}/{num_songs}={minutes_per_song_write}>>{minutes_per_song_write} minutes per song.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: To record all of his songs, Elvis takes 12 * 10 = <<12*10=120>>120 minutes.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: After editing and recording 300 - 120 - 10 = <<300-120-10=170>>170 minutes are left to write all of his songs.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Songwriting therefore took 170 / 10 = <<170/10=17>>17 minutes per song.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'num_songs' (10) was used instead of 'total_editing_minutes' (30).
